content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Hello there, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I would be glad to discuss the rental price with you. However, I must inform you that the apartment is quite small, measuring only 25 square meters. I am sure we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial, but please keep in mind that I am a landlord and my goal is to maximize my gains. If you are interested in renting the apartment, I am willing to negotiate with you, but please understand that I am looking for the highest possible price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am interested in renting the apartment, but I am not sure what price range we should be discussing. Do you have any idea?

Also, I apologize if I come across as rude or impolite, I am just a bit nervous about the negotiation process.
name: Hassan Rahman

content:
I understand that negotiation can be nerve-wracking, but I assure you that I am here to help. As for the price range, it really depends on the location and the condition of the apartment. However, I would recommend starting with an offer of around 500 Euros per month. Of course, I am open to discussing other terms and conditions that may be important to you, such as the length of the lease and any additional fees or charges.

Please keep in mind that I am looking to get the highest possible price for the apartment, but I am also willing to be flexible and work with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to ask and I will do my best to address them.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for at least 12 months. Is that possible?

Also, I am willing to pay the rent in advance, if that would be helpful for you.

Lastly, I am sorry if I come across as rude or impolite, I am just a bit nervous about the negotiation process.

Thanks for your time.

Best regards,

Hassan
name: Hassan Rahman

content:
Yes, renting the apartment for at least 12 months is certainly possible. In fact, I would prefer a longer lease term as it provides more stability for both parties. As for paying the rent in advance, that would be a great gesture and would certainly make my life easier. However, I must inform you that I am looking for the highest possible price for the apartment, and I would like to discuss the terms and conditions in more detail before coming to a final agreement.

Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns, and I will do my best to address them. Thank you for your interest in the apartment, and I look forward to working with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Best regards,

Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
